title: On the Women & Co. Blog: Making the Most of Partnerships
summary: Women & Co.'s President and CEO, Linda Descano CFA®, was recently invited to attend "Building Partnerships: Drive Top Line Revenue, Increase Distribution, and Plan Your Exit," a program for women entrepreneurs and investors. In a new blog post, she shares key strategies for effective partnerships that she gleaned from Debbie Brackeen, Managing Director and Head of Incubation at Citi Ventures.
